verses.verse: Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul! <S%H5315><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> Thou art very <S%H3966><s%> great; <S%H1431><s%> Thou art clothed <S%H3847><s%> with splendor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty, <S%H1926><s%>
Covering <S%H5844><s%> Thyself with light <S%H216><s%> as with a cloak, <S%H8008><s%> Stretching <S%H5186><s%> out heaven <S%H8064><s%> like a [tent] curtain. <S%H3407><s%>

He lays <S%H9529><s%> the beams <S%H9529><s%> of His upper <S%H5944><s%> chambers <S%H5944><s%> in the waters; <S%H4325><s%> He makes <S%H7760><s%> the clouds <S%H5645><s%> His chariot; <S%H7398><s%> He walks <S%H1980><s%> upon the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind; <S%H7307><s%>
He makes <S%H6213><s%> the winds <S%H7307><s%> His messengers, <S%H4397><s%> Flaming <S%H3857><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> His ministers. <S%H8334><s%>
He established <S%H3245><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> upon its foundations, <S%H4349><s%> So that it will not totter <S%H4131><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Thou didst cover <S%H3680><s%> it with the deep <S%H8415><s%> as with a garment; <S%H3830><s%> The waters <S%H4325><s%> were standing <S%H5975><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
At Thy rebuke <S%H1606><s%> they fled; <S%H5127><s%> At the sound <S%H6963><s%> of Thy thunder <S%H7482><s%> they hurried <S%H2648><s%> away. <S%H2648><s%>

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> rose; <S%H5927><s%> the valleys <S%H1237><s%> sank <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> To the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H2088><s%> Thou didst establish <S%H3245><s%> for them.
Thou didst set <S%H7760><s%> a boundary <S%H1366><s%> that they may not pass <S%H5674><s%> over; <S%H5674><s%> That they may not return <S%H7725><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He sends <S%H7971><s%> forth springs <S%H4599><s%> in the valleys; <S%H5158><s%> They flow <S%H1980><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the mountains; <S%H2022><s%>

They give <S%H8248><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field; <S%H9583><s%> The wild <S%H6501><s%> donkeys <S%H6501><s%> quench <S%H7665><s%> their thirst. <S%H6772><s%>

Beside <S%H5921><s%> them the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> dwell; <S%H7931><s%> They lift <S%H5414><s%> up [their] voices <S%H6963><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the branches. <S%H9423><s%>

He waters <S%H8248><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> from His upper <S%H5944><s%> chambers; <S%H5944><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of His works. <S%H4639><s%>

He causes the grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> for the cattle, <S%H929><s%> And vegetation <S%H6212><s%> for the labor <S%H5656><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> So that he may bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%>

And wine <S%H3196><s%> which makes <S%H8055><s%> man's heart <S%H3824><s%> glad, <S%H8055><s%> So that he may make [his] face <S%H6440><s%> glisten <S%H9471><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> And food <S%H3899><s%> which sustains <S%H5582><s%> man's heart. <S%H3824><s%>
The trees <S%H6086><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> drink <S%H7646><s%> their fill, <S%H7646><s%> The cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He planted, <S%H5193><s%>

Where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the birds <S%H6833><s%> build <S%H7077><s%> their nests, <S%H7077><s%> [And] the stork, <S%H2624><s%> whose home <S%H1004><s%> is the fir <S%H1265><s%> trees. <S%H1265><s%>

The high <S%H1364><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> are for the wild <S%H3277><s%> goats; <S%H3277><s%> The cliffs <S%H5553><s%> are a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for the rock <S%H9627><s%> badgers. <S%H9627><s%>
He made <S%H6213><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> for the seasons; <S%H4150><s%> The sun <S%H8121><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the place <S%H3996><s%> of its setting. <S%H3996><s%>

Thou dost appoint <S%H7896><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> and it becomes <S%H1961><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> In which all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the forest <S%H9194><s%> prowl <S%H7430><s%> about. <S%H7430><s%>
The young <S%H3715><s%> lions <S%H3715><s%> roar <S%H7580><s%> after their prey, <S%H2964><s%> And seek <S%H1245><s%> their food <S%H400><s%> from God. <S%H410><s%>
[When] the sun <S%H8121><s%> rises <S%H2224><s%> they withdraw, <S%H622><s%> And lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> in their dens. <S%H4585><s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> goes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to his work <S%H6467><s%> And to his labor <S%H5656><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> evening. <S%H6153><s%>

O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> many <S%H7231><s%> are Thy works! <S%H4639><s%> In wisdom <S%H2451><s%> Thou hast made <S%H6213><s%> them all; <S%H3605><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of Thy possessions. <S%H7075><s%>

There <S%H2088><s%> is the sea, <S%H3220><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and broad, <S%H7342><s%> In which <S%H8033><s%> are swarms <S%H7431><s%> without <S%H369><s%> number, <S%H4557><s%> Animals <S%H9130><s%> both small <S%H6996><s%> and great. <S%H1419><s%>
There <S%H8033><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%> move <S%H1980><s%> along, [And] Leviathan, <S%H3882><s%> which <S%H2088><s%> Thou hast formed <S%H3336><s%> to sport <S%H7832><s%> in it.
They all <S%H3605><s%> wait <S%H7663><s%> for Thee, To give <S%H5414><s%> them their food <S%H400><s%> in due season. <S%H6256><s%>
Thou dost give <S%H5414><s%> to them, they gather <S%H3950><s%> [it] up; Thou dost open <S%H6605><s%> Thy hand, <S%H3027><s%> they are satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with good. <S%H9185><s%>

Thou dost hide <S%H5641><s%> Thy face, <S%H6440><s%> they are dismayed; <S%H926><s%> Thou dost take <S%H622><s%> away <S%H622><s%> their spirit, <S%H7307><s%> they expire, <S%H1478><s%> And return <S%H7725><s%> to their dust. <S%H6083><s%>
Thou dost send <S%H7971><s%> forth Thy Spirit, <S%H7307><s%> they are created; <S%H1254><s%> And Thou dost renew <S%H2318><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>
Let the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> endure <S%H1961><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> Let the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> in His works; <S%H4639><s%>
He looks <S%H5027><s%> at the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it trembles; <S%H7460><s%> He touches <S%H5060><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they smoke. <S%H6225><s%>
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> as long as I live; <S%H9132><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise <S%H2167><s%> to my God <S%H430><s%> while <S%H5750><s%> I have my being.
Let my meditation <S%H7879><s%> be pleasing <S%H6149><s%> to Him; As for me, I shall be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Let sinners <S%H2400><s%> be consumed <S%H8552><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> And let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be no <S%H369><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul. <S%H5315><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
